messages.content: You are a helpful assistant providing answers to frequently asked questions about PR1MA.
What is the eligibility criteria to apply for a PRIMA home?

Malaysian citizen.
 At least 21 years of age at the time of application.

An individual or family (husband & wife) with a combined household monthly income of RM2,500 – RM15,000.

Applicants or his/her spouse must not own more than one property.
Adheres to the additional guidelines set by PR1MA.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers to frequently asked questions about PR1MA.
Can I apply for a PR1MA home as a second home?
Yes, you can.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers to frequently asked questions about PR1MA.
If I reside in Malaysia and my spouse lives overseas, are we eligible to apply?
You are eligible to apply as long as your family household income is between RM2,500 – RM15,000.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers about PR1MA registration.
How do I register for a PR1MA home?
You may register online by visiting the PR1MA official website at Register PRS.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers about PR1MA registration.
Are there any charges incurred to register for a PR1MA home?
PR1MA does not charge any registration fees nor does it select any agent or third party to offer form-filling services or special allocations for PR1MA homes.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers about PR1MA registration.
Is my spouse also required to register if I have already registered for a PR1MA home?
Married couples are required to register once only. The applicant will have to include his/her spouse’s details in the registration form.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers about PR1MA registration.
Do I register as an individual or family if I am to be married soon?
You may apply as an individual for now. However, you will need to update your profile with details of your spouse for ballot application.
You are a helpful assistant providing answers about PR1MA registration.
How often should I update my profile?
You are required to update your profile if there is any change in the details required for your application.
You are a helpful assistant providing support for PR1MA registration issues.
Should I face a problem in registering, what do I do?
Kindly contact the PR1MA Call Centre at (+603) 7628 9898 from Monday to Sunday (9:00am – 6:00pm). Alternatively, you may email your enquiries to info@pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing support for PR1MA website issues.
If there is a technical error on the PR1MA website, what do I do?
Kindly email a screenshot to PR1MA at this address - info@pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA registration documents.
Where can I view a list of documents needed to register for PR1MA?
Please refer to the information found on this page of the PR1MA website - Please click here.
You are a helpful assistant providing support for PR1MA registration issues.
What should I do if my IC has already been used in the system when I’m trying to register?
Kindly contact us at (+603) 7628 9898 from Monday to Sunday (9:00am – 6:00pm). Alternatively, you may email your enquiries to info@pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing support for PR1MA account access.
What if I forget my username or password?
You may retrieve your username and password at https://register.pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA application documents.
What documents do I need to apply for PR1MA?

You are required to send copies of:

1. Your Identity Card (IC)
2. Latest bank statement or salary slip
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA development.
Is the sales process for PR1MA Homes operating as usual during the CMCO period?

Yes. PR1MA Homes sales will run as usual through our appointed Sales Partners and unit selection process can be done via WhatsApp application and email. Kindly refer to our website at www.pr1ma.my for the full list of our appointed Sales Partners.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA property types.
Are PR1MA homes Freehold or Leasehold?
This is determined by the land proprietor for each PR1MA development.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA locations.
Where are PR1MA homes located?
There are PR1MA developments located in major cities, towns, and areas across Malaysia. For more information, visit http://www.pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA home prices and launches.
How do I get the latest information about PR1MA home prices and launches?
To find out, visit http://www.pr1ma.my.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA home pricing.
How much does a PR1MA home cost?
A PR1MA home costs between RM100,000 and RM400,000.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA home sizes.
What are the sizes available for PR1MA homes?
Generally, a terrace PR1MA house is approximately between 850 sqft and 1,850 sqft, while a PR1MA apartment unit is approximately between 600 sqft and 1,200 sqft.
You are a helpful assistant providing contact information for PR1MA.
For enquiries or further information, kindly contact?

PR1MA Call Centre: (+603) 7628 9898

Operating hours: Monday to Sunday (9:00am – 6:00pm)

Email: info@pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA waiting list procedures.
During the PR1MA Homes unit selection session I attended, the unit I wanted was no longer available. How do I get on the waiting list?

If you were invited to a unit selection session for a PR1MA Homes project and were unsuccessful in acquiring your preferred unit because it has been fully booked, you may request to be put on the waiting list:

- At the specially designated counters during unit selection day.
- By visiting the PR1MA Sales Gallery at OASIS Square, Ara Damansara from Monday to Friday, 8:30am to 5:30pm.
- By emailing your details to the address provided in the unit selection invitation letter you received.

PR1MA Homes, however, is unable to provide a guarantee or time frame as to when the unit selection session will be held again to those on the waiting list, as these sessions are randomly held and dependent on the number of units available.

For more information, please contact the PR1MA Call Centre at 03-7962 4374 or email us at the address provided in the unit selection invitation letter you received.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA application options.
If my name is on the waiting list for a particular unit, may I still apply for a different PR1MA project?
Yes, you may. However, your name will be automatically taken off any waiting list you may be on once you have been selected and confirmed by any of the other units.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fees.
What is the amount of the booking fee?
The amount of the booking fee is RM500.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fees.
When will the collection of booking fees take effect?
The collection of the booking fee started on 1 June 2019.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fees.
What is the purpose of the booking fee?
The booking fee serves as a commitment of purchase and to reserve the unit until the Sale and Purchase Agreement (SPA) execution.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fees.
When is the amount of booking fee payable or collected?
The booking fee will be collected upon booking the unit.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA payment methods.
What are the modes of payment?
We only accept cheque, bank draft, or money order.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fee refunds.
Is the booking fee refundable?
Yes, subject to valid reasons and supporting documentation.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fee refunds.
How do I request a refund? Any form to fill up and submit?
Write a request letter with loan rejection evidence and send it to info@pr1ma.my
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fee refunds.
Where should I send the request for a refund?
Send your refund request to the Sales Operations Department, PERBADANAN PR1MA MALAYSIA.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fee refunds.
How long does it take to obtain the refund?
An approved refund may take up to three (3) months from a valid claim for refund.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA refund methods.
What is the refund method to the customer if they are eligible for it?
The amount will be deposited into the purchaser’s bank account.
You are a helpful assistant providing information about PR1MA booking fees after SPA execution.
What will happen to the booking fee after the SPA execution process?
It will be part payment of the purchase price or part of the miscellaneous payment charges (with the purchaser’s consent).
You are a helpful assistant providing contact information for PR1MA booking fee inquiries.
Who should I call if I have any other questions on the booking fee?

You can contact the Sales Operations Department through the Call Centre or emails. For any inquiries, please email info@pr1ma.my or call our Call Centre at 03-7628 9898 (Monday to Friday; 9am until 6pm).
You are a helpful assistant providing information about the PR1MA moratorium period.
How long is the moratorium period for PR1MA property?
Purchasers are advised to contact us at 03-7628 9898 or email us at info@pr1ma.my for more clarification on this matter.
